name: TheEdgy Beatle
text: Seeing lots of bad review's from a year ago, but I can tell you from recent times that we order from them every Friday and always have made good food, given us extra sauce with are barbecue pizza's and food has been on time, the employees are nice as well.

name: Janice Caswell
text:
Perfect-Fresh & Hot
The team at this location do a GREAT JOB

name: Type2 Rider
text: Great food, fast service. Visited drive thru during the Covid pandemic. Thinking PH workers would be more clean than LC's. Didn't see anyone wearing mask or gloves. ☹️

name: Robert Bean
text: Always on time when i pick up, excellent customer service and awesome food!! Thank you Anthony for being the best!!

name: Donna & Terry Cook
text: Ordered supreme pizza barely had any vegetables or meat on it

name: James
text: Cinnabon are very good and the pizza is too. The pizzas are always ready on time and the service is best.

name: Lee Koehn
text: Very friendly workers! So refreshing to meet workers that are genuinely friendly! The pizza was delicious as well!

name: Troy Taylor
text: Best pizza in Bartlesville for consistency. You might get a good one now and then from the others but in my experience Pizza Hut in Bartlesville does them how you want them the best.

name: Lenora Jinkens
text: Worst pizza I have ever had. No flavor. Hardly any topping. Worst service ever! Waited to be seated. Waited to order. Waited n waited for our awful pizza.  Stood at the counter making noise to get a drink refill while employees were n back …More

name: Steve Parmenter
text: I had great service. I went in to order and the gentleman at the counter was talking to another customer on the ph while acknowledging me. When he was done on the ph he helped me and told me what specials they had which i asked for. He was …More

text:
This store has stolen from me and wont make it right.

I ordered $22 in food from them and was charged $27.43 three times! …More

text: The staff at this restaurant are very nice and professional

text: They were fast and friendly and gave me hot and ready pizza best place ever.

name: Lacey Clopp
text: I'm done with pizza hut. Caney burns everything and this was just the last straw. I ordered a cheese lovers with light red sauce and I got NO sauce and barely any cheese on the driest pizza I have ever been served. Sure the pizza ended up …More

text: Ordered pzones and they were ok

name: Cyndi r
text: I really like a manager named Tony.  All the employees at my Pizza hut, are friendly, and my Pizza,  Hand tossed crust, pepperoni is always so delismo! Washington ave. BARTLESVILLE.   Look for Tony,   so nice, .Will make your pizza perfectly

name: Matthew Savala
text: This is my favorite pizza joint in Bartlesville I could eat their food everyday. The crew at this establishment is the most professional and friendly people. They are efficient and always keep me updated on how much longer I have on my order whether I come in and pick it up or I have it delivered.
